taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section arguti;species perpauper;

treatment.description: As small and weak as no. 199; leaflets of primocane-foliage and blades or leaflets of bracts only acute or acutish, with small and merely acutish teeth. (Incl. R. pauperrimus and perhaps R. tantulus Bailey)
treatment.discussion: Perhaps phases of members of Section Setosi.
